posts.post_content:
Hello everyone.  I had one and had to sell it a while back and it is killing my soul. I would like one to go with my rppc of the winchester team.  If anyone has one no matter what condition please message me through the board or at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  I promise to read to it and tuck it in every night if anyone has one.  Thanks

Tony Turner
